@SDA how long ones been activr on one sight doesnt determine how much they may or may not know about the genre. Ive signed up today but have been active on this sight and many others for years and can agree that this isnt 100% ntr. It has the cliche lines but the feel isnt there at all, even from the little brothers POV, no matter how forced his expressions were. 


The only real stupid scenario was her asking him to continue being his friend,  while they were ALREADY FRIENDS and then dropping the most cliche "Ill do anything" line. 

The whole secret relationship scheme has been done before and wasnt ntr in the slightest. 

The Tachibanachi series is a much better example of ntr which this can be compared to, though the kid brother here Isnt fucking his sisters
